channel.title: Interplot on Frederick Solt
channel.description: Recent content in Interplot on Frederick Solt

item.title: Now on CRAN: interplot
item.description: Hu Yue and I just published interplot on CRAN, our first R package. interplot makes graphing the coefficients of variables in interaction terms easy. It outputs ggplot objects, so further customization is simple. Check out the vignette and give it a try!
